Class Canoe

java.lang.Object
com.gradescope.datastructures.Vehicle
com.gradescope.datastructures.Canoe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Vehicle>
public class Canoe extends Vehicle
Represents a Canoe vehicle.

A Canoe is a type of WaterVehicle with specific horsepower rules and a color attribute.

  • Constructor Details

    • Canoe

      public Canoe(double price, int hp, double miles, double weight, String color)
      Constructs a Canoe with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      price - the canoe price (validated in Vehicle)
      hp - the horsepower (must be 2 or 4)
      miles - the canoe mileage (validated in Vehicle)
      weight - the canoe weight (validated in WaterVehicle)
      color - the canoe color (must not be null or blank)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if horsepower is invalid or color is null/blank
